metadata.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.pics > ul > li > a > img@attr->alt');}
metadata.author: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.pics > ul > li:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(3)');}
metadata.img: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.pics > ul > li > a > img@attr->src');}
metadata.link: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.pics > ul > li > a@attr->href');}

detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.mtext > ul > li:nth-child(1) > em');}

tabs.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.title > span:nth-child(2)').replace('选自已喜欢的播放线路 进行播放 24小时更新 新番动漫 BD版资原 日 美剧','');}

chapter.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'ul > ul > li > ul > li');}
chapter.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}
